roleset.name: representing the sacred/classic
roleset.note: ICONIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from iconic.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: And what you think contributes to a film being iconic in general ? soundtrack ? filming style ? use of certain actors ?

example.name: both args
example.text: This photo of twiggy is iconic of the 60s and propelled twiggy to be an icon herself.
